maneuvers.name: Swift Strike
maneuvers.description: You move a number of Spaces up to your Speed and make a Melee Martial Attack against the PD of 1 target within your Melee Range at any point durting this movement. On hit the target takes the damage of your Weapon or Unarmed Strike.

enhancements.name: Disengage
enhancements.description: This movement doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks

enhancements.name: Subsequent Strike
enhancements.description: You gain additional movement equal to halve your Speed and you can target an additional creature using the same Attack Check
